channel.title: Ansible on My Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible on My Digital Garden

item.title: Ansible
item.description: Ansible Ansible playbook syntax: ansible-playbook ./playbooks/apt.yml -i ./inventory/hosts.ini Ansible global directory error on Windows Unmont and mount C drive in WSL sudo umount /mnt/c && sudo mount -t drvfs C: /mnt/c -o metadata Go to ansible directory cd /mnt/c/Users/Tom/ansible Change permissions sudo chmod o-w . Last Modified: =dateformat(this.file.mtime, "DDDD, HH:mm") Tags: =this.file.tags List FROM #ansible
